name: Adept-Spine Shooting Fuban Staff
description: Similar to Chitin Staff; attacks enemies nearby with spines shooting from the staff.
notes: Craftable in New Game+.

name: Bishui Beast Staff
description: Upgrade to the Rat Sage Staff.
notes: Defeat the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast.

name: Bronze Cloud Staff
notes: Obtained with the Deluxe Edition.

name: Chitin Staff
description: Successful charged Heavy Attacks slightly recover Health per Focus Point used.
notes: Craftable after defeating the Second Sister in Chapter 4.

name: Chu-Bai Spear
description: Integrates spear techniques into Light Attack Combo; increases damage of Thrust Stance moves.
notes: Complete the Prisoner Questline in Chapter 3.

name: Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff
description: Increases damage of charged Smash Heavy Attacks.
notes: Defeat Shigandang in Chapter 2; requires finding all six Buddha's Eyeballs.

name: Dark Iron Staff
notes: Craftable in New Game+.

name: Golden Loong Staff
description: Increases damage of Pillar Stance moves; summons a Loong to execute Thunder at the enemy.
notes: Defeat Cyan Loong in Chapter 3.

name: Jingubang
description: The gauge of the 4th Focus Point no longer depletes over time.
notes: Find all four pieces of Sun Wukong's armor; then go to the cave with Jingubang.

name: Kang-Jin Staff
description: Punishing Downpour executes Thunder Damage instead of area damage.
notes: Defeat Kang-Jin Star in Chapter 3, then craft at a Keeper's Shrine.

name: Loongwreathe Staff
description: Increases damage dealt by all Pillar Stance moves.
notes: Defeat the Red Loong or Black Loong.

name: Rat Sage Staff
description: Fourth move of Light Attack Combo and Mobile Staff Spin stir up a whirlwind of sands.
notes: Defeat the Yellow Wind Sage at the end of Chapter 2.

name: Spider Celestial Staff
description: Similar to Chitin Staff; in Poisoned State, hits inflict Poison Bane.
notes: Defeat the Violet Spider in Chapter 4.

name: Spikeshaft Staff
description: Gains Focus after Seeing Through the enemy.
notes: Obtainable after finishing Chapter 3.

name: Staff Of Blazing Karma
description: Charged Heavy Attacks in Smash Stance inflict a bursting lava effect on the ground.
notes: Defeat the Flint Chief, Flint Vanguard, and Mother of Flamlings.

name: Stormflash Loong Staff
description: Draws Thunder while charging; inflicts Thunder Damage with every staff attack when in Shocked State.
notes: Obtainable in New Game+.

name: Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear
description: Integrates spear techniques into Light Attack Combo; increases damage of Thrust Stance moves; shoots swords from the staff upon Forceful Thrust.
notes: Defeat Erlang Shen and the Four Heavenly Kings.

name: Twin Serpents Staff
description: Increases damage of Light Attack Combo finishers; effect enhanced in water.
notes: Unlocked after defeating the Whiteclad Noble in Chapter 1.

name: Visionary Centipede Staff
description: Similar to Chitin Staff; if the enemy is in Poisoned State, enhances Health recovery.
notes: Defeat the Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master in Chapter 4.

name: Wind Bear Staff
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the Unveiling Strike of Cloud Step.
notes: Craftable after defeating Black Bear Guai in Chapter 1.

name: Willow Wood Staff
notes: Unlocked automatically at the beginning of the game.
